__e: Mina and her family have left. They say it's too dangerous here.
Mina's been around a lot longer than you think.
Look, Mina... it's really great to see you again, but I'm really busy and... in fact, I'm... book solid all day.
This is the kind of magic that undermines our authority, challenges all we've done.
No... ..undermines one's faith in Christ, then I think their faith cannot be terribly strong.
What's up with Mom undermining your confidence by saying that I'm the smart one?
